item.title: Azure API Management - What is it all about?
item.description: Introduction Every thing about APIM, creating, hosting api, policies and different kind, subscruotion keys, products to distribute, Dev portal and testing it, monitoring and improve performance, app insight and key matrics. Infrastructure and pricing tiers and multi instances. VNet configs and application gateway and cost effective deployment. Configuration in repository. CICD with ARM templates. Managed Identities to interact with backend APIs. Creating API Management To have an initial setup we are going to create the below resoources Create Resource group Log analystics Application insights API M Postal> search API management and create APIM.
